comments.creator: mconley@mozilla.com
comments.text:
The patch for Bug 669203 fixes Seamonkey so that when an address book is added or removed from places other than the address book manager, the selection does not change in the address book.

We'd like to port this to Thunderbird.
comments.author: mconley@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
The patch for Bug 669203 fixes Seamonkey so that when an address book is added or removed from places other than the address book manager, the selection does not change in the address book.

We'd like to port this to Thunderbird.
